title: Script for tagline
content:
Hi guys,

I am looking for a script/handwriting to be used as a tagline. It must feel friendly, warm and simple. And maybe more important it has to be very legible and work in small sizes.

I've found Tomboy from Letterperfect [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/letterperfect/tomboy/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317184054/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letterperfect/tomboy/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/letterperfect/tomboy/") that I find pretty suitable. However, I think it's a bit too masculine and harsh. I guess it's because it's a signage/marker typeface rather than a script.

Any ideas on similar but with a friendlier appearance?

Thanks!
author: mlvr
